PerformanceMonitor.SettingsIntroduction: Here you can specify the settings for this plugin.
PerformanceMonitor.SettingsRefreshIntervalDescription: Defines how often the widget should be updated.
PerformanceMonitor.SettingsCPOTDescription: Defines the the measurement period in minutes.
PerformanceMonitor.SettingsCPOTHelp: Enter a number which is >= 1 and <= 30
PerformanceMonitor.SettingsHPOTDescription: Defines the period (x * 24h) the last x minutes are compared to.
PerformanceMonitor.SettingsHPOTHelp: Enter a number which is >= 1 and <= 30
PerformanceMonitor.SettingsSitesDescription: Defines which sites are displayed in the overview.
PerformanceMonitor.Description: Key performance indicators of your websites at a glance.
PerformanceMonitor.TopLinkTooltip: Show an overview of all sites performance
